pageTitleClaimant: Can we call you about this claim?
pageTitleDelegatedAuthority: Can we call you about this claim?
pageTitleHelper: Can we call the applicant about this claim?

canWeCall.hint: We might need to call to ask for more information or to discuss the progress of the claim.
canWeCall.requiredClaimant: Select yes if we can call you about this claim.
canWeCall.requiredDelegatedAuthority: Select yes if we can call you about this claim.
canWeCall.requiredHelper: Select yes if we can contact the applicant about this claim.
canWeCall.changeClaimant: Change whether we can call you about this claim
canWeCall.changeDelegatedAuthority: Change whether we can call you about this claim
canWeCall.changeHelper: Change whether we can call the applicant about this claim

contactTelephone.labelClaimant: What is your contact telephone number?
contactTelephone.labelDelegatedAuthority: What is your contact telephone number?
contactTelephone.labelHelper: What is the applicant’s contact telephone number?
contactTelephone.requiredHelper: Enter the applicant’s contact telephone number.
contactTelephone.formatClaimant: Enter your contact telephone number using numbers 0 to 9, spaces, hyphens, brackets and dashes.
contactTelephone.formatDelegatedAuthority: Enter your contact telephone number using numbers 0 to 9, spaces, hyphens, brackets and dashes.
contactTelephone.formatHelper: Enter the applicant’s contact telephone number using numbers 0 to 9, spaces, hyphens, brackets and dashes.
contactTelephone.lengthClaimant: Enter your contact telephone number using 20 characters or less.
contactTelephone.lengthDelegatedAuthority: Enter your contact telephone number using 20 characters or less.
contactTelephone.lengthHelper: Enter the applicant’s contact telephone number using 20 characters or less.
contactTelephone.changeHelper: Change the applicant’s contact telephone number
